name: 5CC DL Carrier Aggregation Extension
summary: The 5CC DL Carrier Aggregation Extension feature supports the capability to transmit

parameters.name: CarrierAggregationFunction.caPreference
parameters.description: If the Uplink Carrier Aggregation feature is enabled, the parameter                                 is recommended to be set to DL. If it is set to                                     NONE, it is possible that some UEs are not                                 configured with the optimal number of downlink component                                 carriers.

parameters.name: CarrierAggregationFunction.sCellDeactOutOfCoverageTimer
parameters.description: To avoid unnecessary SCell deactivation in poor PCell uplink channel                                 condition, one of the following settings is recommended:  sCellDeactOutOfCoverageTimer ≥                                             MAX(240, 3 *                                                 CarrierAggregationFunction.sCellDeactProhibitTimer                                             + 100)     sCellDeactOutOfCoverageTimer =                                             -1

parameters.name: CarrierAggregationFunction.sCellSelectionMode
parameters.description: The recommended setting is                                     UN_ACK_SIMULTANEOUS_SCELL_SELECTION or                                     ACK_SIMULTANEOUS_SCELL_SELECTION. If the                                 PCell has good coverage overlap with the SCells, these settings                                 reduce latency on initial SCell selection.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.noOfPucchFormat3PrbPairs
parameters.description: The attribute must be set to 1 in cells to be used as PCell. Only                                 values 0 and 1 are supported.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.noOfPucchFormat3PrbPairs
parameters.description: The attribute must be set to 1 in cells to be used as PCell. Only                                 values 0 and 1 are supported.

parameters.name: EUtranCellRelation.sCellCandidate
parameters.description: It can be avoided that a cell relation is configured for unsupported                                 uplink carrier aggregation by setting                                     EUtranCellRelation.sCellCandidate to                                     ONLY_ALLOWED_FOR_DL.

parameters.name: QciProfileOperatorDefined.pdcpSNLength  QciProfilePredefined.pdcpSNLength
parameters.description: The attribute is recommended to be set to 15.

parameters.name: QciProfileOperatorDefined.rlcSNLength  QciProfilePredefined.rlcSNLength
parameters.description: The attribute is recommended to be set to 16 when the                                     rlcMode attribute for the same QCI is set                                 to AM.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UETR_RRC_SCELL_DECONFIGURED
parameters.description: Identity of the cell used as SCell, defined in MOM, where                                         eNodeB ID (20 bits) + Cell ID (8 bits).  Reason for deconfiguring SCell.  Reported RSRP of the serving cell.  Reported RSRQ of the serving cell.  True if the SCell is on another eNB.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UETR_RRC_SCELL_CONFIGURED
parameters.type: EVENT_PARAM_GLOBAL_SCELL_ID  EVENT_PARAM_SCELL_SELECTION_METHOD  EVENT_PARAM_SERVING_RSRP  EVENT_PARAM_SERVING_RSRQ  EVENT_PARAM_SCELL_CONFIG_RESULT  EVENT_PARAM_SCELL_IS_EXTERNAL
parameters.description: Identity of the cell used as SCell, defined in MOM, where                                         eNodeB ID (20 bits) + Cell ID (8 bits) .  Method used to select SCell.  Reported RSRP of the serving cell.  Reported RSRQ of the serving cell.  Result code for SCell configuration attempt.  True if the SCell is on another eNodeB.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UETR_MEASUREMENT_REPORT_RECEIVED
parameters.type: EVENT_PARAM_MEASUREMENT_ID  EVENT_PARAM_MEAS_REQUESTER  EVENT_PARAM_NEIGHBOR_CGI  EVENT_PARAM_AFFECTED_MEAS_TYPE  EVENT_PARAM_RAT_TYPE  EVENT_PARAM_MEAS_CAUSE
parameters.description: The measurement ID for this UE measurement.  The function that requested the measurement (e.g.:                                             EVENT_VALUE_CA for Carrier                                         Aggregation).  Global Cell ID of the neighbor cell.  The measurement type triggering the report (e.g.:                                             EVENT_VALUE_EVENT_A1,                                             EVENT_VALUE_EVENT_A2,                                             EVENT_VALUE_EVENT_A6).  The RAT type triggering the report.  The purpose of the report.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UETR_RRC_SCELL_DECONFIGURED
events.description: Identity of the cell used as SCell, defined in MOM, where                                         eNodeB ID (20 bits) + Cell ID (8 bits).  Reason for deconfiguring SCell.  Reported RSRP of the serving cell.  Reported RSRQ of the serving cell.  True if the SCell is on another eNB.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UETR_RRC_SCELL_CONFIGURED
events.type: EVENT_PARAM_GLOBAL_SCELL_ID  EVENT_PARAM_SCELL_SELECTION_METHOD  EVENT_PARAM_SERVING_RSRP  EVENT_PARAM_SERVING_RSRQ  EVENT_PARAM_SCELL_CONFIG_RESULT  EVENT_PARAM_SCELL_IS_EXTERNAL
events.description: Identity of the cell used as SCell, defined in MOM, where                                         eNodeB ID (20 bits) + Cell ID (8 bits) .  Method used to select SCell.  Reported RSRP of the serving cell.  Reported RSRQ of the serving cell.  Result code for SCell configuration attempt.  True if the SCell is on another eNodeB.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UETR_MEASUREMENT_REPORT_RECEIVED
events.type: EVENT_PARAM_MEASUREMENT_ID  EVENT_PARAM_MEAS_REQUESTER  EVENT_PARAM_NEIGHBOR_CGI  EVENT_PARAM_AFFECTED_MEAS_TYPE  EVENT_PARAM_RAT_TYPE  EVENT_PARAM_MEAS_CAUSE
events.description: The measurement ID for this UE measurement.  The function that requested the measurement (e.g.:                                             EVENT_VALUE_CA for Carrier                                         Aggregation).  Global Cell ID of the neighbor cell.  The measurement type triggering the report (e.g.:                                             EVENT_VALUE_EVENT_A1,                                             EVENT_VALUE_EVENT_A2,                                             EVENT_VALUE_EVENT_A6).  The RAT type triggering the report.  The purpose of the report.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011981 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011981 MO instance.
